sentence.Network_en: Siberian breed of white or cream dog of the spitz family.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯皮茨狗科的白色或奶油色皮毛的西伯利亚狗.

sentence.Network_en: Every time Buck tried to bite his throat, he met Spitz teeth.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一次巴克去咬它的脖子, 斯皮兹总能攻守兼顾.

sentence.Network_cn: 美国游泳运动员马克·施皮茨在1972年慕尼黑奥运会上获7枚金牌.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German Spitz(hund), from spitz 'pointed' + Hund 'dog'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various stocky heavy-coated breeds of dogs native to northern regions having pointed muzzles and erect ears with a curled furry tail
